name: Copy Advanced
description:
Have more control over what you can copy from webpages. 

This extension allows you to copy the following: 

✓ Link text
✓ Link location
✓ The inner HTML of any element
✓ The value of any text field or text area (even if it is disabled)
✓ The selected text without any formatting
✓ The selected text without the leading and proceeding whitespace (trimmed)

Please visit our homepage if you have any feedback or suggestions.
